displaytitle: Drawing after a sarcophagus of the Triumph of Bacchus in the Villa Medici
medium: Pen and brown ink heightened with white chalk
creditline: Museum purchase, Laura P. Hall Memorial Fund

titles.title: Drawing after a sarcophagus of the Triumph of Bacchus in the Villa Medici

texts.textentryhtml: purchased for the Laura P. Hall Memorial Collection from Delius Geise, New York
